For example, to enable it for allstatic resources... code-block:: python config = { '/static': { 'tools.staticdir.on': True, 'cors.expose.on': True, } }See `simple-example<https://github.com/yougov/cherrypy-cors/blob/master/simple-example.py>`_for a runnable example.
